en.SD1: With which navigation map product that your company has cooperated with NavInfo? (Multiple choice)
en.SD2: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of NavInfo’s navigation map data?
en.SD3: How satisfied are you with the feature richness of NavInfo’s navigation map data?
en.SD4: In the past year’s cooperation with NavInfo’s navigation map, were there any serious data quality issues that has a major impact on your company? How satisfied are you with it?
en.SD5: In the past year’s cooperation with NavInfo’s navigation map, which type of data update frequency do your company choose? How satisfied are you with it?
en.SD6: How does your company receive NavInfo’s navigation map products? How satisfied are you with it?
en.SD7: How satisfied are you with the stability of online publishing service of NavInfo’s navigation map product?
en.SD8: How satisfied are you with the timely delivery of NavInfo’s navigation map product?
en.SD9: How satisfied are you with customer issues response speed in navigation map cooperation of NavInfo?
en.SD10: How satisfied are you with the reply of customer issues in navigation map cooperation of NavInfo?
en.SD11: How satisfied are you with the current product quality management system of NavInfo?
en.SD12: In the beginning of business negotiation, how satisfied are you with the project team of NavInfo?
en.SD13: During the requirement communication process, how satisfied are you with the project team of NavInfo?
en.SD14: During project execution process, how satisfied are you with the project team of NavInfo?
en.SD15: What aspects of NavInfo navigation map product do you think deserve being recognized? And what aspects need to be improved?
en.SD16: Compare with similar products of other companies, how satisfied are you with the price of NavInfo’s navigation map product?
en.SD17: Do you think it is timely to receive the latest product and service information of NavInfo?
en.SD18: How do you get the latest product and service information of NavInfo? (Multiple choice)
en.SD19: Which of the following NavInfo products and services do you think would establish cooperation with your company?(Multiple choice)
en.HD1: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of NavInfo’s HD map data?
en.HD2: How satisfied are you with the feature richness of NavInfo’s HD map data?
en.HD3: In the past year's cooperation with NavInfo in HD map, were there any data quality issues that has a major impact on your company? How satisfied are you with it?
en.HD4: How satisfied are you with the product design of NavInfo’s HD map?
en.HD5: How satisfied are you with the product functions of NavInfo’s HD map?
en.HD6: How satisfied are you with the product safety of NavInfo’s HD map?
en.HD7: How satisfied are you with the timely delivery of NavInfo’s HD map?
en.HD8: How satisfied are you with the operation and maintenance response speed of NavInfo’s HD map?
en.HD9: How satisfied are you with the operation and maintenance system monitoring of NavInfo’s HD map?
en.HD10: How satisfied are you with the maintenance and update of NavInfo’s HD map?
en.HD11: How satisfied are you with the push and download of NavInfo’s HD map?
en.HD12: How satisfied are you with the customer issue response speed in HD map cooperation with NavInfo?
en.HD13: How satisfied are you with the answers to customer issues in HD map cooperation with NavInfo?
en.HD14: How satisfied are you with the current quality management system of NavInfo?
en.HD15: How satisfied are you with the improvement of quality management system of NavInfo?
en.HD19: What aspects of NavInfo HD map product do you think deserve being recognized? And what aspects need to be improved?
